mapper.select: SELECT board_tb.uid, category_tb.category, member_tb.nickname AS writer, board_tb.title, board_tb.content, board_tb.regdate, board_tb.view, SUM(CASE WHEN recommend_tb.rec_nrec = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS rec FROM board_tb INNER JOIN category_tb ON category_tb.uid = board_tb.category INNER JOIN member_tb ON member_tb.email = board_tb.writer LEFT JOIN recommend_tb ON recommend_tb.board_uid = board_tb.uid GROUP BY board_tb.uid, category_tb.category, member_tb.nickname, board_tb.title, board_tb.content, board_tb.regdate, board_tb.view, rec ORDER BY board_tb.uid DESC LIMIT 15 OFFSET #{offSet}
